msg: Incomplete - #603: Factor out webapp bootstrapping for reuse

Started work on trying to get nakedobjects.properties being loaded from classpath (the use of servletContext#getRealPath() is inadvisable, apparently), but not there yet (intend to abstract using ResourceStreamSource).
